title: 96/567/EC, ECSC, Euratom: Commission Decision of 19 September 1996 amending Decision 94/90/ECSC, EC, Euratom of 8 February 1994 on public access to Commission documents
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 19 September 1996 amending Decision 94/90/ECSC, EC, Euratom of 8 February 1994 on public access to Commission documents (96/567/Euratom, ECSC, EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 2 (5) of Decision 94/90/ECSC, EC, Euratom is replaced by the following:
'A fee of ECU 10, plus ECU 0,036 per sheet of paper, may be charged for copies of printed documents exceeding 30 sheets. Charges for information in other formats shall be set on a case-by-case basis but shall not exceed what is reasonable.`
This Decision will take effect on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 September 1996.
For the Commission
The President
Jacques SANTER
(1) OJ No L 46, 18. 2. 1994, p. 58.
